note: I am an ageing maker of games. Been doing this since the mid 1980's and I'm not slowing down. I live for technology and especially VR. Lover of all music but especially everything from the 1980's and modern synthwave. I am a technology / gadget freak and I own multiple VR headsets, lots of computers and laptops, every Nexus phone ever released, camera and lighting equipment, drones etc, etc. I am vegetarian and I share my house with multiple gorgeous cats. I won't entertain any form of hate.
